cards.name: Gnerl Fighter Pods
cards.loadout: Every model is equipped with: 1 Missile Pod; 1 Triple Barreled Nose Cannons; 1 Armored Hull.

other.name: Interceptor
other.description: Each time a model in this unit makes a ranged attack that targets a unit that can Fly, add 1 to the Hit roll.

cards.name: Regult Battle Pods
cards.loadout: Each model is equipped with: 1 Electron Beam Guns; 1 Armored Feet.
wargear: For every 3 models in this unit, 1 model may be equipped with one of the following: ◦ 1 Heavy Missile Pod ◦ 1 Light Missile Pod ◦ 1 Long Range Electron Beam Guns

other.name: High Speed Assault
other.description: Each time this unit Advances, do not make an Advance roll for it. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in this unit.

cards.name: Regult Heavy Battle Pods
cards.loadout: Each model is equipped with: 1 Electron Beam Guns; 1 Heavy Missile Pod; 1 Armored Feet.
wargear: Any model in this unit may each replace 1 Heavy Missile Pod with one of the following: ◦ 1 Light Missile Pod ◦ 1 Long Range Electron Beam Guns

other.name: Saturation Fire
other.description: Each time this unit Remains Stationary, until the start of your next Movement phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in this unit have the [Ignores Cover] ability.

cards.name: Regult Ace
cards.leader: This model can be attached to the following unit: ■ Regult Battle Pods ■ Regult Heavy Battle Pods
cards.loadout: This model is equipped with: 1 Electron Beam Guns; 1 Armored Feet.

other.name: Regult Commander
other.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a ranged attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1.

leads.extra: You can attach this model to the above units only if the unit contains 2 or more models.

cards.name: Regult Tactical Scout
cards.leader: This model can be attached to the following unit: ■ Regult Battle Pods ■ Regult Heavy Battle Pods
cards.loadout: This model is equipped with: 1 Long Range Sensors; 1 Armored Feet.

wargear.name: Long Range Sensors
wargear.description: Enemy units that are set up on the battlefield from Reserves cannot be set up within 12" of this model.

other.name: Regult Tactical Scout
other.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit is selected to shoot, you can re-roll one Hit roll or you can re-roll one Wound roll when resolving its attacks.

leads.extra: You can attach this model to the above units only if the unit contains 2 or more models. You can attach this model to one of the above units even if one Regult Ace model has already been attached to it. If you do, and that Bodyguard unit is destroyed, the Leader units attached to it become separate units, with their original Starting Strengths.

cards.name: Glaug Battle Pod
cards.loadout: This model is equipped with: 1 Heavy Impact Cannons; 1 Long Range Electron Beam Gun; 1 Armored Feet.

other.name: Battle Coordinator (Aura)
other.description: While a friendly ZENTRAEDI WALKER BATTLELINE unit is within 6" of this model, this model gains the [Lone Operative] ability. Each time a model in that unit makes a ranged attack, re-roll a Wound roll of 1.

other.name: Trained Ace
other.description: Each time this model makes a ranged attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to the Hit roll.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

cards.name: Kamjin Kravshera
composition: 1 Kamjin Kravshera in a Glaug Battle Pod
cards.loadout: This model is equipped with: 1 Heavy Impact Cannons; 1 Long Range Electron Beam Gun; 1 Armored Feet.

other.name: Battle Coordinator (Aura)
other.description: While a friendly ZENTRAEDI WALKER BATTLELINE unit is within 6" of this model, this model gains the [Lone Operative] ability. Each time a model in that unit makes a ranged attack, re-roll a Wound roll of 1.

other.name: Bad Boss
other.description: Once per battle round, at the start of any phase, you can select one friendly Zentraedi Walker unit that is Battle-shocked and within 12" of this model. If you do, one model in that unit is destroyed, and that unit is then no longer Battle-shocked.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

cards.name: Moruk Laplamiz
composition: 1 Moruk Laplamiz in a Glaug Battle Pod
cards.loadout: This model is equipped with: 1 Heavy Impact Cannons; 1 Long Range Electron Beam Gun; 1 Armored Feet.

other.name: Battle Coordinator (Aura)
other.description: While a friendly ZENTRAEDI WALKER BATTLELINE unit is within 6" of this model, this model gains the [Lone Operative] ability. Each time a model in that unit makes a ranged attack, re-roll a Wound roll of 1.

other.name: Ace Pilot
other.description: In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, this unit can make a Normal move. If it does so, until the end of the turn, this unit is not eligible to declare a charge.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

cards.name: Nousjadeul-Ger Battle Suit
cards.loadout: This model is equipped with: 1 Laser Submachine Gun; 1 Large Bore Liquid Plasma Cannon; 1 Rapid Fire Impact Cannon; 1 Armored Feet.

other.name: Purpose Built
other.description: Each time a model in this unit makes an attack that targets a Monster or Vehicle unit, you can re-roll the Wound roll.

cards.name: Kamjin Kravshera
cards.leader: This model can be attached to the following unit: ■ Nousjadeul-Ger Battle Suits
composition: 1 Kamjin Kravshera in a Nousjadeul-Ger Battle Suit
cards.loadout: This model is equipped with: 1 Laser Submachine Gun; 1 Large Bore Liquid Plasma Cannon; 1 Rapid Fire Impact Cannon; 1 Armored Feet.

other.name: Battle Coordinator
other.description: While leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a ranged attack, re-roll a Wound roll of 1.

other.name: Bad Boss
other.description: Once per battle round, at the start of any phase, you can select one friendly Zentraedi Walker unit that is Battle-shocked and within 12" of this model. If you do, one model in that unit is destroyed, and that unit is then no longer Battle-shocked.

leads.extra: You can attach this model to the above unit only if it contains 2 or more models.

cards.name: Queadlunn Rau Battle Suit
cards.loadout: This model is equipped with: 1 Fire Linked Impact Cannons; 2 Micro-Missile Pods; 1 Triple Barreled Anti-Air Laser Guns; 1 Armored Feet.

other.name: High Speed Maneuverability
other.description: Models in this unit are eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back.

cards.name: Queadlunn Rau Ace
cards.leader: This model can be attached to the following unit: ■ Queadlunn Rau Battle Suits
cards.loadout: This model is equipped with: 1 Fire Linked Impact Cannons; 2 Micro-Missile Pods; 1 Triple Barreled Anti-Air Laser Guns; 1 Armored Feet.

other.name: Regult Commander
other.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a ranged attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1.

leads.extra: You can attach this model to the above unit only if it contains 2 or more models.

cards.name: Milia Falyna
cards.leader: This model can be attached to the following unit: ■ Queadlunn Rau Battle Suits
composition: 1 Milia Falyna in a Queadlunn Rau Battle Suit
cards.loadout: This model is equipped with: 1 Fire Linked Impact Cannons; 2 Micro-Missile Pods; 1 Triple Barreled Anti-Air Laser Guns; 1 Armored Feet.

other.name: Ace Pilot
other.description: This model, and any models in a unit this model is Leading, are always considered to have the Benefit of Cover, and may reroll any Save roll of 1.

leads.extra: You can attach this model to the above unit only if it contains 2 or more models.

cards.name: Moruk Laplamiz
cards.leader: This model can be attached to the following unit: ■ Queadlunn Rau Battle Suits
composition: 1 Moruk Laplamiz in a Queadlunn Rau Battle Suit
cards.loadout: This model is equipped with: 1 Fire Linked Impact Cannons; 2 Micro-Missile Pods; 1 Triple Barreled Anti-Air Laser Guns; 1 Armored Feet.

other.name: Ace Tactics
other.description: When this model is leading a unit, models in that unit are always considered to have the [stealth] ability.

leads.extra: You can attach this model to the above unit only if it contains 2 or more models.
